summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent in the New York Field Office arranging a video call with a contact regarding the Epstein case, likely for an interview or information gathering related to child exploitation and human trafficking.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The sender of the email, arranging a video call with a contact regarding the Epstein case from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk.

events.title: Scheduled Video Call
events.description: A video call is scheduled for around 12:30pm EST between an FBI Special Agent and a contact regarding the Epstein case.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office

keyFacts: The email is from an FBI Special Agent in the New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk.
It arranges a video call for the following day (October 8, 2021) around 12:30pm EST.
The recipient's email address is redacted in the provided text, but the agent notes 'Her email is her time' and that 'She's central so 11:30am', indicating the contact is in the Central Time Zone.
